

## 有关设备的参数

### 摄像内存储的图像参数


### 摄像头存储的imu参数

``` c
slam@slam-Default-string:~/catkin_ws/src/MYNT-EYE-S-SDK/samples/_output/bin/tutorials$ ./get_imu_params 
I/utils.cc:35 Detecting MYNT EYE devices
I/utils.cc:48 MYNT EYE devices:
I/utils.cc:51   index: 0, name: MYNT-EYE-S1030, sn: 0507273D00090721, firmware: 2.4
I/utils.cc:60 Only one MYNT EYE device, select index: 0
I/synthetic.cc:52 camera calib model: pinhole
I/get_imu_params.cc:23 Motion intrinsics: {accel: {scale: [1.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 1.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 1.00000000000000000], assembly: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], drift: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], noise: [0.01692543239797352, 0.01673531019556103, 0.01745248750459097], bias: [0.00019031356589715, 0.00016996777864587, 0.00054490537096494], x: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], y: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], z: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000]}, gyro: {scale: [1.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 1.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 1.00000000000000000], assembly: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, -.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], drift: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], noise: [0.00108480261588199, 0.00124663678835018, 0.00110032299198064], bias: [0.00002340483413674, 0.00002359677156776, 0.00001497041805633], x: [1140736314266383264226818417113863395414836194116724598268279865857904996078944749352588034714794406296483338328847191254557141766192217179736694268390166659605990028443925777372074279650191037992516335308747182542477577086542806840698485080064.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], y: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000], z: [0.00000000000000000, 0.00000000000000000]}}
```

## 标定所得的imu参数（两种工具结果基本一致）

``` c
accelerometer_noise_density: 0.00072019   #Noise density (continuous-time)
accelerometer_random_walk:    0.00006862  #Bias random walk

#Gyroscopes
gyroscope_noise_density:     0.00005682   #Noise density (continuous-time)
gyroscope_random_walk:    0.00000559  #Bias random walk

rostopic:    /mynteye/imu/data_raw   #the IMU ROS topic
update_rate:  200.0      #Hz (for discretization of the values above)
    
    
    
离散200hz
type: IMU
name: A3
Gyr:
   unit: " rad/s"
   avg-axis:
      gyr_n: 8.9236703514432596e-04
      gyr_w: 2.4977410034090481e-05
          
          
          Acc:
   unit: " m/s^2"
   avg-axis:
      acc_n: 1.1350499190604338e-02
      acc_w: 2.7814950001455314e-04
   
```
